title: Osananajimi no Mama ja Iya?
original_name: 幼なじみのママじゃイヤ？
sinopse:
People often say that falling in love is a wonderful thing, but what if the one you fall in love with wants to be your mom?

A story about a boy who agreed to his childhood friend's proposition of becoming his "mom." He thought they were playing house, but she meant it for real.

(Source: MangaDex)
